capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Snape's family history and it turns out he has a pretty complex lineage. His mother, Eileen Prince, was a witch, but his father, Tobias Snape, was a Muggle. That's what makes him a mixed-wizard, which is really interesting. I find it fascinating that Snape's heritage has such a significant impact on who he becomes as a person.
